about_the_game:
Summer Outfit Pack 1 of 2.

Outfits included:

Perry: (Not) Dexter Hawaiian Shirt
American Dave/Canadian Dave: California Surfin'
Cady: Tourist
Ein Mozart Nixon: A Doctor
Jack: Red Shirt
Kirk: Blue the Space Dog
Morris: Road Warrior
Ogid New: Knitted Cthulhu Mask
Phaze: Earth Knight
Thatcher: Assassin

Plus 4 alt-outfits for the secret party members.

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Summer
- Click on San Diego Comic-Con 2017
detailed_description:
Summer Outfit Pack 1 of 2.

Outfits included:

Perry: (Not) Dexter Hawaiian Shirt
American Dave/Canadian Dave: California Surfin'
Cady: Tourist
Ein Mozart Nixon: A Doctor
Jack: Red Shirt
Kirk: Blue the Space Dog
Morris: Road Warrior
Ogid New: Knitted Cthulhu Mask
Phaze: Earth Knight
Thatcher: Assassin

Plus 4 alt-outfits for the secret party members.

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Summer
- Click on San Diego Comic-Con 2017
